text: Piute Spring may be a spring in: ==United States== ===California=== *Piute Spring (San Bernardino County, California) in San Bernardino County, California *Piute Spring (Kern County, California) in Kern County, California ===Nevada=== *Piute Spring (Washoe County, Nevada) in Washoe County, Nevada, *Piute Springs (Clark County, Nevada) in Clark County, Nevada, ===Oregon=== *Piute Spring (Malheur County, Oregon) in Malheur County, Oregon ===Utah=== *Piute Spring (San Juan County, Utah) in San Juan County, Utah ==References==
title: Piute Spring
